main/AU-2/AU-2.py: channel.send("logger 'AU-2 TEST' && grep 'AU-2 TEST' /var/log/syslog | tail -1 | wc -l\n")
main/SC-16/SC-16.py: stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command("cmm amfCipheringAlgorithm show | grep \"cipheringAlgPrio1\" | grep -o \"snow3G\|aes\|zuc\" | wc -l\n")
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command("cmm amfCipheringAlgorithm show | grep \"cipheringAlgPrio1\" | grep -o \"none\|noCiphering\" | wc -l")
main/AU-3/AU-3.py: out = ssh_exec("if [ `grep -E -i 'Debian' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then logger 'AU-3 TEST' && grep 'AU-3 TEST' /var/log/syslog | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E `date '+%b.*%d.*%H'`'.*AU-3 TEST' /var/log/syslog | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E `hostname`'.*AU-3 TEST' /var/log/syslog | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E `logname`'.*AU-3 TEST' /var/log/syslog | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E -i 'Fail*|Succe*' /var/log/syslog | wc -l; else if [ `grep -E -i 'Redhat' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then logger 'AU-3 TEST' && grep 'AU-3 TEST' /var/log/messages | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E `date '+%d.*%H'`'.*AU-3 TEST' /var/log/messages | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E `hostname -s`'.*AU-3 TEST' /var/log/messages | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E `logname`'.*AU-3 TEST' /var/log/messages | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E -i 'Fail*|Succe*' /var/log/messages | wc -l; else echo 'Error'; fi fi")
main/AC-4/InformationFlowEnforcement.py: channel.send("sudo timeout 5 tcpdump -c 50 -i "+interface+" -nn \"arp and not net "+network+"\" 2> /dev/null | wc -l\n")
main/AC-3/AccessEnforcement.py: channel.send("fsdumpgroups | grep gidNumber | sort | uniq | wc -l\n")
channel.send("sudo cmm-secure-log-analyzer -s | awk '{print$1}' | sed 's\\:$\\\\g' | sort | uniq | wc -l\n")
main/MA-4/MA-4.py: channel.send("grep -i sshd.*accept /var/log/auth.log | wc -l && grep -i sshd.*open /var/log/auth.log | wc -l && grep -i sshd.*close /var/log/auth.log | wc -l\n")
main/AC-17/AC-17.py: out = ssh_exec("if [ `grep -E -i 'Debian' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then grep sshd /var/log/auth.log | wc -l && grep 'grep sshd' /home/`logname`/.bash_history | wc -l; else if [ `grep -E -i 'Redhat' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then grep sshd /var/log/secure | wc -l && grep 'grep sshd' /home/`logname`/.bash_history | wc -l; else echo 'Error'; fi fi")
main/IA-4/IA-4.py: stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command("fsdumpgroups | grep -A 2 'cn: _nokfsuipmgroot' | grep '^UID:' | awk -F ':' '{print$2}'")
main/MA-2/MA-2.py: stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command("cmm alarm active list | awk -F '|' '{print$5}' | sed 's/ //g' | grep -v SEVERITY | sort | uniq | sed '1d' |wc -l")
main/SI-4/SI-4.py: stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command("ping "+logserver_ip+" -c1 -t1 | grep \"time=\" | wc -l\n")
main/SI-2/SI-2.py: out = ssh_exec("if [ `grep -E -i 'Debian' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then date -d \"`grep 'upgrade'  /var/log/dpkg.log | tail -1 | awk '{print $1}'`\" +%s && date '+%s'; else if [ `grep -E -i 'Redhat' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then date -d \"`grep 'updated'  /var/log/yum.log | tail -1 | awk '{print $1}'`\" +%s && date '+%s'; else echo 'Error'; fi fi")
main/AU-11/AU-11.py: channel.send("date -d \"`stat /var/log/\`ls /var/log/ | grep syslog | tail -n 1\` | grep Modify | awk '{print $2}'`\" +%s\n")
channel.send("mkdir /home/`whoami`/AU-11 && cp /var/log/`ls /var/log/ | grep syslog | tail -n 1` /home/`whoami`/AU-11/ && gunzip /home/`whoami`/AU-11/`ls /var/log/ | grep syslog | tail -n 1`\n")
main/CM-10/CM-10.py: out = ssh_exec("if [ `grep -E -i 'Debian' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then apt list --installed; else if [ `grep -E -i 'Redhat' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then rpm -qa; else echo 'Error'; fi fi")
main/CA-7_remote/CA-7_remote.py: stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command("ping "+ping_ip+" -c1 -t1 | grep \"time=\" | wc -l\n")
